name: Madcow 5x5
description: Originally created by Bill Starr, the writer of the book “The Strongest Shall Survive” this program is great for adding muscle mass and increasing overall strength and fitness levels.

fields.name: pr_week
fields.label: Match PRs in Week #
fields.description: The week in which you want to match your previous 5RMs

fields.name: interval
fields.label: Set Interval
fields.description: The size of the steps between your ramped sets
